rukus.text: denʹ prybude koly my sklykayemo z kozhnoyi spilʹnoty deyakoyi z tsykh khto ne viryv v nashym dokazam, forcibly
Koly vony prybuvayutʹ, Vin skazhe, "Vy vidkhylyly Moyi vidkryttya, pered tym yak nabuvaty znannya pro nykh. Tsi ne yaki vy
Vony zaznayutʹ requital dlya yikhnʹoho wickedness; vony nichoho ne skazhutʹ
vony ne pobachyly shcho my zrobyly nich dlya yikhnʹoho vidpochynku, ta denʹ osvityly? Tsey povynni buty dostatni dokazy dlya lyudey shcho vvazhayutʹ
Na dni koly rih duyetʹsya, kozhnyy u nebi ta zemli bude horrified, krim tsykh vybranoyi BOHOM. Vesʹ prybude pered tym, yak Yo, forcibly
Koly vy dyvytesʹ na hory, vy dumayete shcho vony stoyatʹ dosi. Ale vony vyhlyadayutʹ zvorushlyvi, yak khmary. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu vyrobnytstvo BOHA, khto perfected vse. Vin tsilkom Cognizant vse vy
Tsey khto prynosyatʹ harni pratsi (u yikhnikh zapysakh) otrymaye daleki krashchi vynahorody, ta vony budutʹ doskonalo zabezpechuyutʹ z zhakhu toho dnya
Yak dlya tsykh khto prynosyatʹ zlo pratsi, vony budutʹ prymushuvatysya u Peklo. Vy ne pryyizhdzhayete requited za shcho vy
ya prosto nakazuyusʹ shchob obozhnyuvaty Lorda tsʹoho mista - Vin vstyh bezpechnyy sanctuary - ta Vin volodiye vsima rechamy. YA nakazuyusʹ shchob buty submitter
Ta shchob deklamuvaty Quran. Whoever keruyetʹsya keruyetʹsya dlya yoho vlasnyy harnyy, ta yakshcho vony zablukayutʹsya, todi kazhutʹ, "ya ye prosto warner
Ta kazhutʹ, "Pokhvala musytʹ BOH; Vin pokazhe vam Yoho dokazy, do vy vyznayete yikh. Vash Lord nikoly unaware budʹ shcho vy
